survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced rides in autonomous vehicles to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand user preferences.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key strengths.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes for multi-choice selection.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of your autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future autonomous vehicle rides?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future autonomous vehicle rides?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of repeat usage.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical issues during your autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify technical issues encountered.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical issues during your autonomous vehicle ride?
